author: IGN
description: Jason is here to strike terror into his enemies and continue his bloody legacy. Check out 'The Haunting x Jason' Trailer for Call of Duty: Warzone & Black Ops 6, the latest entries in the first-person shooter franchise. Players will face nightmares of all kinds in The Haunting, a horror-themed experience for the season. Face off against the undead, Jason, the Predator, and more in The Haunting for Call of Duty: Warzone & Black Ops 6, available now.
title: Call of Duty: Warzone & Black Ops 6 - Official 'The Haunting x Jason' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Announcement Trailer for Avatar Legends: The Fighting Game (working title), an upcoming action fighting game based on the beloved Avatar franchise, developed by Gameplay Group International in collaboration with Paramount. Avatar Legends: The Fighting Game is slated for release on Steam, PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch 2 at a later date.

Features and mechanics will be announced soon. Avatar Legends: The Fighting Game is a working title; official title to be determined at a later date.

Wishlist Now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2424420/Avatar_Legends_The_Fighting_Game/

For more updates, follow the official channels below:
https://x.com/avatar_fighters
https://www.instagram.com/avatar_fighters/ 
https://www.youtube.com/@Avatar_Fighters 
https://www.tiktok.com/@avatar_fighters


#AvatarLegendsTheFightingGame #Gaming #IGN
title: Avatar Legends: The Fighting Game - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Miary Zo, the Fighting God Reborn, joins the Tekken 8 roster as the final character of Year 2. 
With a unique style fighting style mimicking animals, and the powers of Ancient Ogre from Tekken 3, Miary Zo moves around the arena at blinding speed and hits hard! She also comes with her own stage "Baobab Horizon", set in her home country of Madagascar!
Miary Zo comes to Tekken 8 on December 2nd, 2025, for all Character Pass holders and December 5th, 2025, for individual purchase. Tekken 8 is available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Tekken 8 - Official Miary Zo Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
If you like this video and would like to see more like it, make sure to subscribe to @eurogamer on YouTube. 

Baby Steps is a devious climbing simulator and story-rich arthouse treatise on the millennial condition from noted scamps Devolver Digital, and the sort of game that should arguably come with a health warning for people with high blood pressure and a disclaimer about broken controllers. 

It's also one of the funniest games in recent memory. But it's no joke that it's a serious GOTY contender, worthy of comparison to Hideo Kojima at his subversive best: and the parallels to Death Stranding are striking. 

This video was created by Jim Trinca and was originally featured on Eurogamer.

#IGN #BabySteps #Eurogamer
title: Baby Steps is Death Stranding for Masochists
